summary: This mod aims to give Skyrim\'s gentle giants a new lease on life
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes Horkers A LOT faster and A Lot stronger. Just stay away from them they can kill shadowmere in like 5 hits. and the fast thing to. Its hilarious so send Lydia in and enjoy the sight of her charging them at 5 mph and them charging her at 50 mph.

To install this just use winrar or 7zip to extract the download into your skyrim data folder and then click on data files in the launcher and check the box next to the name of the mod.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1i5TIIzWdqM&feature=youtu.be
This is a video previewing the mod.
author: HeathHeyniac
